de.lessvoid.nifty

Class Nifty

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.nifty.Nifty

  • public class Nifty
extends Object
    The main control class of all things Nifty.
    Author:
    void

      • getSceneInfoLog

        public String getSceneInfoLog()
        Output the state of all root nodes (and the whole tree below) to a String. This is meant to aid in debugging. DON'T RELY ON ANY INFORMATION IN HERE SINCE THIS CAN BE CHANGED IN FUTURE RELEASES!
        Returns:
        String that contains the debugging info for all root nodes

      • getSceneInfoLog

        public String getSceneInfoLog(String filter)
        Output the state of all Nifty to a String. This is meant to aid in debugging. DON'T RELY ON ANY INFORMATION IN HERE SINCE THIS CAN BE CHANGED IN FUTURE RELEASES!
        Parameters:
        filter - regexp to filter the output (Example: "position" will only output position info)
        Returns:
        String that contains the debugging info for all root nodes

      • getStatistics

        public NiftyStatistics getStatistics()
        Get the NiftyStatistics instance where you can request a lot of statistics about Nifty.
        Returns:
        the NiftyStatistics instance

      • getTimeProvider

        public TimeProvider getTimeProvider()
        Get the TimeProvider of this Nifty instance.
        Returns:
        the TimeProvider

      • clearScreenBeforeRender

        public void clearScreenBeforeRender()
        Call this to let Nifty clear the screen when it renders the GUI. This might be useful when the only thing you're currently rendering is the GUI. If you render the GUI as an overlay you better not enable that :)

                                                   Class<X> clazz)

      • setShowRenderBuckets

        public void setShowRenderBuckets(boolean showRenderBuckets)
        Set showRenderBuckets to true to overlay a random color quad above each updated RenderBucket.
        Parameters:
        showRenderBuckets - the value to set showRenderBuckets to

      • setShowRenderNodes

        public void setShowRenderNodes(boolean showRenderNodes)
        Set showRenderNodes to true to overlay a quad in the color set to the showRenderNodeOverlayColor.
        Parameters:
        showRenderNodes - the value to set showRenderNodes to

      • setShowRenderNodeOverlayColor

        public void setShowRenderNodeOverlayColor(NiftyColor color)
        Set the showRenderNodeOverlayColor - the color used to overlay each renderNode when showRenderNodes is set to true.
        Parameters:
        color - the color to render showRenderNodes overlays with
